Isadore and Sadie Dorin Forum     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Isadore and Sadie Dorin Forum      Isadore and Sadie Dorin Forum   Main Menu    Facilities           Main Hall    Meeting Rooms         Reserving Space           Event Application Form    Building Policies    Box Office/Tickets         Services    Graduation Packages    Contact Us           Staff          Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Isadore and Sadie Dorin Forum       Isadore and Sadie Dorin Forum              The Isadore & Sadie Dorin Forum is a multi-purpose facility located on the East Campus of theÂ  University of Illinois at Chicago at the intersection of Halsted St. & Roosevelt Rd. The UIC Dorin Forum is a safe space for Campus Events, Community Functions, Private Events and serves as host to many other functions. We strive to provide a safe and open environment for all of our users and guests.
